title: Head of the house
creator_credit: Richard Leacock, Irving Jacoby and Affiliated Film Producers
brief_description: A story of community action in mental health, showing how a social worker, a policeman and a minister join forces to help a young boy through the vicissitudes of growing up. This film stresses the relationship between the authoritarian attitudes of a father to his son and the boy’s psychological difficulties.
